definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: You don't do a fitting when you buy a store-bought suit.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是成衣店購買的衣服，就不可能試穿修改。

sentences.english: Alice is trying on the yellow dress. It's a little longer.
sentences.chinese: 埃麗絲正在試穿那條黃裙子，裙子有點長。

sentences.english: Grace tried on dresses over her shorts and tank top .
sentences.chinese: 格雷斯試穿婚紗時僅穿著短褲和背心。

sentences.english: Do you like this dress, Alice? Try it on.
sentences.chinese: 你喜歡這件洋裝嗎，愛莉絲？試穿看看嘛。

sentences.english: She is breaking in a new pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她正在試穿一雙新鞋使之逐漸合腳。

sentences.english: E. g. I'd like to take these dresses into a fitting room and try them on.
sentences.chinese: 我想把這幾件洋裝拿到更衣間試穿一下。

sentences.english: I try it on and then go back and get the same size.
sentences.chinese: 試穿完後，我就回頭去拿另一件同樣尺碼的新衣。

sentences.english: Experience trying on the slopwork , custom-tailor more relieved.
sentences.chinese: 成衣試穿體驗，定做更放心。

sentences.english: You can use the dressing room…
sentences.chinese: 你可以在試衣室裏試穿。

sentences.english: Try on this coat for size.
sentences.chinese: 試穿一下這件外套看是否合身。

sentences.english: Please try the shoes on before you buy them.
The two ugly stepsisters try on the shoe, but their feet are too big.
sentences.chinese: 兩個醜姊姊試穿這隻鞋，不過她們的腳太大了。

sentences.english: Here it is. Please try it on and take a look in the mirrot.
sentences.chinese: 這套就是，請試穿，併到鏡子前看看。

sentences.english: When trying it on, always start on the loosest clasp.
sentences.chinese: 試穿的時分，先試最寬鬆的扣子。

sentences.english: Without trying them on, I can't decide whether I should buy these fitted leather pants or not.
sentences.chinese: 不試穿，我沒有辦法決定要不要買這些合身的皮褲。

definition: to return merchandise/to withdraw a product
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
to make to order/to have sth made to order
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
sales counter dedicated to a certain kind of product (e.g. alcohol)
